Class MetaVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Vertex
      • main.MetaVertex

  • public class MetaVertex
extends Vertex
    A Vertex to represent a subgraph within a graph.
    Author:
    kaan

    • Method Detail

      • canCreateMetaNode

        public static boolean canCreateMetaNode(java.util.List<Vertex> vertices,
                                        Graph parentGraph)
        Returns whether it is safe to create a meta-vertex. The conditions are that all the vertices should be in parent graph, and a loop shouldn't be formed when the meta-vertex is formed.
        Parameters:
        vertices -
        parentGraph -
        Returns:
        Whether it is safe to create a meta-vertex.
